x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Many organizations find it difficult to engage employees in volunteering or community service activities due to lack of centralized visibility or scheduling tools.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.project_name: Community Connect – Volunteer and CSR Portal
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

A Volunteer & CSR Portal built on ServiceNow where employees can browse opportunities, register for events, log hours, and earn digital recognition badges. Managers can track participation metrics.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Employee Center Pro

App Engine Studio

Flow Designer (for approvals and notifications)

Performance Analytics

Integration with HR systems for employee data

External event APIs (e.g., NGOs or community databases)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Integration with external volunteer organizations

Maintaining accurate event information

Ensuring accessibility and usability
